Zhong Hui:
Cao Pi 钟会
Audacious Schemer 桀骜的野心家

Amassing Power 权计
When Zhong Hui receives an unit of damage, he may draw a card and put a hand card on your player. It is known as a power card. For every power card you have, your hand size limit increases by one.

Uprising 自立
[Awakening] At the start of Zhong Hui's turn, if you have three Power cards, you must reduce your max health by 1, then heal 1 health or draw 2 cards, and gain [Eradicate].

Eradicate 排异
Once during his action phase, Zhong Hui may discard one power card and make someone draw 2 cards. If the player has more hand cards than you after drawing, then you inflict one damage to them.
Ma Dai:
Cao Pi 马岱
Entrusted During Crisis 临危受命

Horsemanship 马术
Ma Dai always has a -1 distance bonus.

Sneak Attack 潜袭
When Ma Dai attacks and damage someone within a range of 1, he may flip a judgement. If it is not hearts, then he may prevent the damage, and instead reduce the target's max health by 1.
Liao Hua:
Cao Pi 廖化
Loaded With Experience 历经沧桑

Forefront 当先
At the beginning of his turn, Liao Hua performs an extra action phase.

Longevity 伏枥
Once per game, when Liao Hua is on the brink of death, he may flip over and heal X (where X is the number of factions still alive).
Guan Xing Zhang Bao:
Cao Pi 关兴 张苞
Cubs of the Generals 将门虎子

Spirit of Fathers 父魂
During their drawing phase, Guan Xing and Zhang Bao may skip their drawing phase and reveal the top two cards, then take them. If the two cards revealed are different colors, they gain the abilities [Warrior Saint] and [Roar] until end of turn.

Warrior Saint 武圣
You may use any red card as an Attack.

Roar 咆哮
You have no restrictions on how many times you may attack.
Bu Lian Shi:
Cao Pi 步练师
Queen of the Fallen Kingdom 无冕之后

Sympathy 安恤
Once during her action phase, Bu Lian Shi may select any two players with unequal hand sizes. The player with less cards takes a card from the other player, then reveals it. If it is not a spade, Bu Lian Shi draws a card.

Recall 追忆
When Bu Lian Shi dies, she may select someone who is not her killer. That person draws 3 cards and heals 1 health.
Han Dang:
Cao Pi 韩当
Stoned Noble 石城侯

Bow Ride 弓骑
Han Dang may use any equipment card as an Attack. Attacks created this way have no range restrictions.

Resolve 解烦
Whenever a player brings another player to the brink of death, you may use an Attack on the first player. If that Attack would do damage, instead prevent that damage, and act as if Han Dang used a Peach on the second player.
Cheng Pu:
Cao Pi 程普
Gangster General 荡寇将军

Immolate 疠火
Cheng Pu may use any Attack as a Fire Attack. If a Fire Attack created this way deals damage, Cheng Pu loses 1 health. When using a Fire Attack, Cheng Pu may select an additional target.

Brewery 醇醪
At the end of Cheng Pu's turn, if you have no cards on your player, you may put any number of Attacks on your player card. These cards are known as Brew. Whenever any player enters the brink of death, you may use a Brew to act like that player used a Wine.
Hua Xiong:
Cao Pi 华雄
Demon General 魔将

Reckless 恃勇
Whenever Hua Xiong takes damage from a red Attack or a wine Attack, his maximum health is reduced by 1.
Liu Biao:
Cao Pi 刘表
Lord of South Han 跨蹈汉南

Self-Preservation 自守
During Liu Biao's drawing phase, he may draw an additional X cards (where X is how much health he is missing) and skip his action phase.

House of Royalty 宗室
Liu Biao's hand size limit is increased by 1 for every faction still alive.
Yang Xiu:
Cao Pi 杨修
Unrestrained Genius 恃才放旷

Sharing Cake 啖酪
When Yang Xiu is targeted by a tool card that also affects others, he may choose to draw a card. If he does, the tool card no longer affects him.

Chicken Ribs 鸡肋
When Yang Xiu takes damage, he may select a type of card (basic, tool, equipment). The player that dealt the damage may no longer play cards of that type until the end of the current turn.
Gongsun Zan:
Cao Pi 公孙瓒
Whitehorse General 白馬將軍

Righteous Cavalry 义从
When Gongsun Zan has more than 2 health, he has a -1 distance bonus; when Gongsun Zan has less than or equal to 2 health, he has a +1 distance bonus.
Yuan Shu:
Cao Pi 袁术
Emperor of Zhong 仲家帝

Mediocrity 庸肆
During his drawing phase, Yuan Shu draws X extra cards. During his discard phase, Yuan Shu has to discard at least X hand cards. (X is the number of factions still alive.)

Imposter 偽帝
Yuan Shu possesses the King Ability of the current ruler.
Cai Wen Ji:
Cao Pi 蔡文姬
Extraordinary Talent 金璧之才

Elegy 悲歌
When a player takes damage from an Attack, Cai Wen Ji may discard one card, and make the victim flip a judgement. If the judgement is hearts, the victim heals 1 health. If the judgement is diamonds, the victim draws 2 card. If the judgement is clubs, the attacker discards 2 cards. If the judgement is spades, the attacker flips over.

Sorrow 断肠
The player that kills Cai Wen Ji loses all abilities.
Liu Shan:
Cao Pi 刘禅
The Hopeless King 无为的真命主

Carefree 享乐
Whenever another player uses an Attack on you, they must discard a basic card, or the Attack has no effect on you.

Nihalism 放权
You may skip your action phase and discard a card after the discard phase. If you do, another player takes an extra turn after this one.

Eiron 若愚
King Ability: [Awakening] At the start of your turn, if your health is less than 3, you must gain 1 max health, heal 1 health, and gain [Rouse] (Rouse: Shu characters may use an Attack on your behalf.)
Jiang Wei:
Cao Pi 姜维
Mantle of the Dragon 龙的衣钵

Taunt 挑衅
Once during his action phase, Jiang Wei may pick any player able to Attack him. That player must use an Attack on Jiang Wei. If that player does not, Jiang Wei may discard one of their cards.

Recommence 志继
[Awakening] At the start of Jiang Wei's turn, if he has no hand cards, he must regain 1 health or draw 2 cards, then lose 1 max health, and gain [Astrology].

Astrology 观星
At the beginning of your turn, you may look at the top X cards of the deck (where X is the number of people that are alive (max of 5)). You may put any number of those cards on the bottom of the deck and in any order on top of the deck.
Deng Ai:
Cao Pi 邓艾
The Staunch Warrior 矫然的壮士

Manifest Destiny 屯田
Whenever you lose (not use) a card outside of your turn, you may do a judgement. If the judgement is not a heart, you may put that judgement card on your player. It is known as a Field. For each Field on Deng Ai, his distance to every other character is reduced by 1.

Imperialism 凿险
[Awakening] At the start of Deng Ai's turn, if he has 3 or more Fields, he must lose 1 maximum health, and gain [Exploitation].

Exploitation 急袭
During your action phase, you may use Fields as Steals.
Zhang He:
Cao Pi 张合
The Military Clairvoyant 料敌机先

Flexibility 巧变
On his turn, Zhang He may discard a hand card to skip any phase (excluding beginning/ending phases). If you skip your drawing phase this way, you may instead draw a hand card from each of up to two players. If you skip your action phase this way, you may instead relocate any judgement or equipment card to an appropriate location.
Zhang Zhao Zhang Hong:
Cao Pi 张昭 张宏
Worldclass Managers 经天纬地

Advise 直谏
During their action phase, Zhang Zhao and Zhang Hong may play an equipment card onto any other character (this ability cannot replace existing equipment), then draw a card.

Stability 固政
After each other player's discard phase, Zhang Zhao and Zhang Hong may return one discarded card to the owner's hand, then take all of the other discarded cards.
Sun Ce:
Cao Pi 孙策
Unrivaled Aptitude 猛锐盖世

Passion 激昂
Whenever you target another player or another player targets you with a red Attack or a Duel, you may draw a card.

Wraith Form 魂姿
[Awakening] At the start of Sun Ce's turn, if he has 1 health, he must lose 1 max health, and gain [Brave Gesture] and [Brave Spirit]. (Brave Gesture: You may draw an extra card during your drawing phase. Brave Spirit: Before your turn, you may force a player to: Draw X cards and discard 1 card, or Draw 1 card and discard X cards (where X is the amount of health you are missing).

Takeover 制霸
King Ability: On the action phase of other Wu characters, they may choose to point duel you. If you win, you keep both cards used in the point duel. If you are woke, you may decline the duel.
Fa Zheng:
Cao Pi 法正
Supporting Wings of Shu 蜀汉的辅翼

Reciprocaton 恩怨
When another player heals Fa Zheng, they may draw a card. When another player deals damage to Fa Zheng, they must give him a heart or lose one health.

Mass Confusion 眩惑
Once during his action phase, Fa Zheng may give a heart to another player, then take a card from that player and give it to anyone (including himself).
Ma Su:
Cao Pi 马谡
The Conceited Talent 怀才自负

Winning Hearts 心战
Once during his action phase, if Ma Su has more cards than his max health, then he may view the top three cards of the deck, display and keep any number of hearts, and place the rest back on the top of the draw pile in any order.

Big Sad 挥泪
The player that kills Ma Su must discard all of their cards.
Xu Shu:
Cao Pi 徐庶
The Loyal Gallant 忠孝的侠士

Silence 无言
All non-time-delayed tool cards played by Xu Shu do not affect others. All non-time-delayed tool cards played by others do not affect Xu Shu

Advocate 举荐
Once during his action phase, Xu Shu may discard up to three cards, and allow another player to draw that many cards. If Xu Shu discarded three cards of the same type, he gains one health.
Cao Zhi:
Cao Pi 曹植
World's Talent 八斗之才

Falling Bloom 落英
Whenever a club is discarded or enters the discard pile from a judgement, Cao Zhi may choose to take it.

Drunk Poetry 酒诗
When Cao Zhi is facing up, he may flip over his character and act as if he used a wine. When Cao Zhi takes damage while facing down, Cao Zhi may flip his character card back up after the damage is calculated.
Yu Jin:
Cao Pi 于禁
Backbone of the Wei Military 魏武之刚

Resolute 毅重
When Yu Jin does not have armor equiped, black Attacks have no effect on him.
Zhang Chun Hua:
Cao Pi 张春华
Cold-Blooded Empress 冷血皇后

Ruthless 绝情
All damage dealt by Zhang Chun Hua is counted as loss of health. (It does not trigger abilities that activate upon "damage".)

Bereavement 伤逝
Whenever Zhang Chun Hua has less than X cards, she may draw cards up until she has X cards (X being the number of health she is missing (at most 2)).
Wu Guo Tai:
Cao Pi 吴国太
Old and Wise 年高德劭

Honeydew 甘露
Once during her action phase, Wu Guo Tai may choose two players and swap their equipments, as long as the difference in amount of equipments does not exceed her missing health.

Benefit 补益
Whenever a player enters the brink of death, Wu Guo Tai may reveal one of the player's hand cards at random. If it is not basic, then the card is discarded, and the player gains one health.
Xu Sheng:
Cao Pi 徐盛
Iron Wall of the East 江东的铁壁

Stampede 破军
Whenever Xu Sheng deals attack damage, he may force the target to draw cards equal to their current health and flip over their character card.
Ling Tong:
Cao Pi 凌统
Proud and Courageous 豪情烈胆

Whirlwind 旋风
Whenever Ling Tong loses an equipment card, he may choose one of the following: Act as if he attacked any player regardless of range, or deal one damage to a player within a range of 1.
Chen Gong:
Cao Pi 陈宫
Candid and Heroic 刚直壮烈

Brilliant Scheme 明策
Once during his action phase, Chen Gong may give an equipment or an Attack to another player. The recipient may then choose one of the following: Act as if the recipient used an Attack on another player, within range of the recipient, of Chen Gong's choosing, or draw 1 card.

Mental Delay 智迟
Whenever Chen Gong receives damage during another player's turn, any basic and non-time delayed tool cards no longer affect affect Chen Gong until the end of the turn.
Gao Shun:
Cao Pi 高顺
Unstoppable Force 攻无不克

Ambush 陷阵
Once during his action phase, Gao Shun may point duel with another player. If he wins, until end of turn, he ignores distance to the target, he ignores the target's armor, and he may use any number of attacks on the target. If he loses, he cannot attack for the rest of his turn.

18th Amendment 禁酒
All of Gao Shun's wines are attacks. (They cannot be used as wine.)
